long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Qyrus is a end to end testing platform designed to test Web, Mobile and APIs for all digital enterprises. With its codeless approach to testing Web, Mobile & APIs, Qyrus is the fastest way to start the journey of automated testing for your enterprise.
QORS:
To streamline API testing using the Qyrus platform, users have the convenience of initiating a "quick run" for their APIs. Given that user APIs might enforce specific policies, for seamless execution, activating the CORS plugin enables users to swiftly preview their APIs, bypassing CORS errors in certain scenarios
It's crucial for users to quickly execute their APIs before finalizing their tests
